job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a software engineer who loves designing, building, and maintaining software. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies in the security field and contribute to protect IBM's customers from cyber threats at scale.

   As part of your job, you will be part of the integration team, working on existing and new microservices. You will be involved in the design decisions of backend service components, you will develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready. You will be responsible for those components. You will also be involved in writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component. You will work in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard., Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer - Python

We are looking for a software engineer who loves designing, building, and maintaining software. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies in the security field and contribute to protect IBM's customers from cyber threats at scale.

   As part of your job, you will be part of the integration team, working on existing and new microservices. You will be involved in the design decisions of backend service components, you will develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready. You will be responsible for those components. You will also be involved in writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component. You will work in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard., Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. If you are interested in a flexible working pattern, please talk to our recruitment team to find out if this is possible in the current working environment.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks like building and maintaining microservices, backend service components, and CI/CD pipelines. While it mentions 'cutting edge technologies in the security field' and 'protect IBM's customers from cyber threats at scale', it lacks any specific mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies. The role appears to be a standard Software Developer position, not one focused on AI/ML engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'designing, building, and maintaining software', 'working on existing and new microservices', 'design decisions of backend service components', and 'develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready'. This aligns directly with traditional software development responsibilities.
The phrase 'working on existing and new microservices' is a clear indicator of software development tasks related to building and maintaining service-oriented architectures.
job_tasks.phrase: working on existing and new microservices

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility for 'design decisions of backend service components' falls under the scope of software engineering for backend systems.
job_tasks.phrase: design decisions of backend service components

job_tasks.justification: The requirement to 'develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready' is a fundamental aspect of the software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: develop and test your applications in order to make them production ready

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'You will be responsible for those components' indicates ownership and accountability for the developed software, a common aspect of software engineering roles.
The mention of 'writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component' directly relates to Operations Engineering and the automation of software deployment and integration.
job_tasks.phrase: writing the CI/CD pipelines of the component

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'working in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard' highlights the importance of teamwork and open communication.
job_tasks.phrase: working in a collaborative environment, where everybody's voice is heard
